descriptionHtml:
Made this one for my paladin character
this mod simply adds 2 Restoration based weapon enchantments

Sanctified Light:
Burns undead with holy light for ## points of damage.

Judgement of Justice:
Judges living targets for ## points of holy damage.

damage from those enchantments ignore magic resistances (if target has any that is :P)

WHERE TO GET THE ENCHANTMENTS:

open console and type in to view ids of maces with this enchantment:
help JOTP

then type in:
player.additem ID# 1

for example : player.additem 000666 1

I have my reasons why it is that way.. first i wanted to avoid cluttering crafting list secondly i didnt want to tinker with leveled items list thus avoid conflicts.
author: DrOuroboros
